Please find our internal booking advice below for your kind reference.
For any payment-related follow-ups, please contact our payments team directly at paymentsoperations@chalhoub.com <mailto:paymentsoperations@chalhoub.com> .
The team has been instructed to release the payment before the end of the month. As such, please allow some time for internal approval and processing before following up.
Additionally, I count on your support in unblocking the account within this week, as the current situation is causing real problems.
I thank you for your support, as always.
Best Regards,
Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

Thanks for your email.

 

We have received the extension confirmation from GIG on the expiring program until 30th November 2025 subject to expiring terms and conditions with the below subjectivity. Although we are still discussing with GIG to waive or ease it off and will keep you posted.

We have received the extension confirmation from GIG on the expiring program until 30th November 2025 subject to expiring terms and conditions with the below subjectivity. Although we are still discussing with GIG to waive or ease it off and will keep you posted.

 

This extension is subject to credit control matters exceeding 90 days being settled prior to the 1stOctober 2025, and full compliance with KYC requirements for the Casualty policies (this needs to be done prior to current expiry date of 23rd September).

 

Vysakh will write you with the extension premium on the ongoing renewal chain.

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Subject: RE: Invoice Successful Submission - Details (R369754)
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Prashant,

Thank you for your update.

There is no issue from our side regarding the subjectivity mentioned. Kindly proceed to request an additional invoice of AED 150,000 to be included as part of the marine insurance extension for Allied Enterprises LLC, which is managed by Shruthi. I will advise shortly on how to allocate this amount.

However, I would appreciate it if you could confirm by return that the account block has been removed with immediate effect. We currently have numerous claims on hold due to this block, and the aggregate value of these claims is several multiples of the amount due to GIG.

Please treat this matter as top priority.

Thank You & Kind Regards,
Hagop

Please treat this matter as top priority.

Thank You & Kind Regards,
Hagop
